description:
When Knog first wanted to build the Lil’ Cobber, 18 factories told them it couldn’t be done, Knog persisted and the result is dazzling. Using chip on board (COB) LEDs it creates a wall of light, like a screen, but way brighter. At only 22 grams per light, it's a worthwhile addition to your bike kit.

  • 330° viewing angle keeps you seen
  • Maintains brightness for up to 90% of battery capacity
  • Magnetic mount click in place on bars, posts, seatstays or headtubes up to 20cm circumference
  • ModeMaker app customizes lighting modes: 4 up front, 5 out back, including: steady (high and low), pulse, flash and eco flash
  • Front light is 100 lumens, rear is 50 lumens
  • IP67 waterproof design sheds rain
  • Simple 1-button interface cycles through modes
  • Lockout mode prevents accidental activation
  • Integrated USB plug (type-A)
  • LED battery status indicator
  • Dimensions: 22 x 33 x 33mm
name: Knog Lil' Cobber Twinpack Light Set
